qas.question: How many private institutes of technology are there in India?
How many government-affiliated institutes of technology are there in India?
What organization oversees India's technical education institutions?

context: There are <a0_0>16<a0_0/> autonomous Indian Institutes of Technology in addition to <a1_0>30<a1_0/> National Institutes of Technology which are Government Institutions. In addition to these there are many other Universities which offer higher technical courses. The Authority over technical education in India is the <a2_0>AICTE<a2_0/>.
